questions.question: A shield law protects reporters from being forced to reveal their sources.
Wearing arm bands and burning flags are examples of prior restraint.
Any comments criticizing the government are considered seditious speech.
Picketing involves striking workers patrolling a business site.
An article in a magazine falsely accusing a public official of a crime is slander.
Which of the following types of commercial speech may States prohibit?

choices.answer: advertisement of services that are illegal
products that are harmful to the public
Average person would find it obscene
created to exploit women or minors

questions.question: Which is NOT a rule by which the Supreme Court judges obscenity?
The branch of the media that has been subjected to the most extensive regulation is

choices.answer: unconstitutional EXCEPT when natl security is threatened
preferable to punishment after the fact
allowed only when offensive to minority groups

questions.question: Which is an accurate statement about Supreme Court and prior restraint?
The Supreme Court has held that reporters

choices.answer: cannot be forced to reveal source
may be forced to reveal source to enforcement agency
may be protected from revealing source thru Congress
can be held no longer than 30 days
